channel.title: The keep button of what u will keep if u die on rs2
channel.description:
okay i have just found this out some of you may already know this but RuneScape had made a thing u can click on to tell what u will keep if u die. u click on the button next to the inventory that tell whats u r wearing and down at the bottem you have 2 buttons u can press to see what u will keep like mine. --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- \i am wearing the following/ \this is my inventory/ nature teaira large pouch | medium pouch legends-ammy-nothing small pouch cape of glory 25 pure ess | | | lunar builders nothing staff tops | | | builders legs barrows | ring gloves rune of boots weath --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- this is what i would keep out of all that barrows gloves legends cape ammy of glory
and the rest i will lose and the pouch i will aways lose that is what the white like is around --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- please feel free to look and tell what you will lose if u die if u wont to please relies i just found out about it this is just for fun

item.title: The keep button of what u will keep if u die on rs2
item.dc:creator: @alex4ever alex4ever
item.description:
@alex4ever wrote:

[quote="~R E B O R N~, post:8, topic:121546"][quote author=God of Ikiliki link=topic=171156.msg1583919#msg1583919 date=1184071200]
Ok…?

I even lose my chain omg.
I’ll drop my veracs to keep chain lol.
I’m very lucky anyways, ever I had this stuff to a house from someone, we fight and he poison and kicked me.
I had 4hp and poison, I run to the bank, poison hit 3, I banked everything and 1 second later I died lol.
Was with all this stuff.
[/quote]
Yeah, something simualr happened to me =/, someone wanted me to go to their house so I did and they gave me something called “Karabuam” or something and told me to cook it so I did and then we faught in his boxing ring and he got me to 4 hp and then kicked me out of his house and I lost 30m including a Green H’Mask or more >.< and kept D scimmy black mystic hat and top lol. Well I died because he told me to eat the Karabuam thing so I did because I had low health and I died.

I didn’t know what Karabuam was so I didn’t think much of it lol, I didn’t do the quest that you need karabuam for or whatever.[/quote][quote=“God of Ikiliki, post:9, topic:121546”][quote author=~R E B O R N~ link=topic=171156.msg1583929#msg1583929 date=1184071699]

Ok…?

I even lose my chain omg.
I’ll drop my veracs to keep chain lol.
I’m very lucky anyways, ever I had this stuff to a house from someone, we fight and he poison and kicked me.
I had 4hp and poison, I run to the bank, poison hit 3, I banked everything and 1 second later I died lol.
Was with all this stuff.

Yeah, something simualr happened to me =/, someone wanted me to go to their house so I did and they gave me something called “Karabuam” or something and told me to cook it so I did and then we faught in his boxing ring and he got me to 4 hp and then kicked me out of his house and I lost 30m including a Green H’Mask or more >.< and kept D scimmy black mystic hat and top lol. Well I died because he told me to eat the Karabuam thing so I did because I had low health and I died.

I didn’t know what Karabuam was so I didn’t think much of it lol, I didn’t do the quest that you need karabuam for or whatever.
[/quote]
Wow that sucks seriously,
I’m lucky I was on time with 1 second lol[/quote]dude u guys better hole u don’t die lol or u will lose alot of stuff

Read full topic

I’m lucky I was on time with 1 second lol

[quote=“God of Ikiliki, post:7, topic:121546”]Ok…?

I even lose my chain omg.
I’ll drop my veracs to keep chain lol.
I’m very lucky anyways, ever I had this stuff to a house from someone, we fight and he poison and kicked me.
I had 4hp and poison, I run to the bank, poison hit 3, I banked everything and 1 second later I died lol.

Well I died because he told me to eat the Karabuam thing so I did because I had low health and I died.

The order appeared differently when I moved some items around in my inventory and then reopened the menu.

item.title: The keep button of what u will keep if u die on rs2
item.dc:creator: @w00tz0r_pwnz w00tz0r pwnz
item.description:
@w00tz0r_pwnz wrote:

I just figured out something with that. You always keep the same 3 items but the order is determined by where they are in your inventory. Not exactly sure where they have to be but I figured out thats what changes it.

Read full topic
